ygData.subject: Re: EQ slang
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah yes - the end justifies the means..  Cheating is okay - it s only a computer game isn t it? Well - Verant has gone to great extremes to try to balance this
ygData.messageBody:
Ah yes - the end justifies the means.. Cheating is okay - it's only a
computer game isn't it?

Well - Verant has gone to great extremes to try to balance this game (as to
whether one agrees how successful they are is another issue...) Bug
exploitation in multi-player games can have a disastrous affect on the "fun"
that everyone else has in the game. I have seen an online game destroyed by
a bug that wiped out the game economy.

Some people may feel that they are paying their $10/month a don't care about
anyone else's $10/month - but I for one am not one of them...

Slyde of Xegony

From: <MrS8N@...>

Subject: Re: [eqbards] EQ slang
